descriptionHtml:
Do you wonder why, after hiding alone into the deepest darkest isolated dungeon, you can hear a voice next to you like "here, take this (stolen item)" ?

     Do you wonder why, after walking several hours in the middle of nowhere, you found a bandit/ vampire/ killer awaiting for someone to trick and kill? AWAITING in the middle of NOWHERE??


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


     While playing the game i was annoyed by those two facts:

one: no matter how well hidden i am (in a cave), the game knows where i am. And send to me a messenger, a courier, a bandit, etc.

two: no matter how far and remote the place where i am is, there will be someone awaiting for me to meet. A killer, a bandit, a vampire, etc.

     The whole concept of wilderness were thus ruined off. Well, not anymore.


     With this mod, the wilderness is wilderness. Nobody knows that you are there. Roads are darn empty too, like it should be. Only wild animals/ creatures/ etc here.
Due to dragons and creatures dangers, nobody ventures to far from the cities/villages now.

     In the wild, the remaining persons that can be found are those that have a specific place to stay.

- fishers/hunters that have a specific place.
- bandits/necromancers/ members of civil war that have a specific place.
- khajiit caravans, but only near the cities, arriving or departing



     You can be found by people (couriers) only when approaching the settlements. 

     When you are in to the wild, you will not found and not be found by humans, except those above.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Technical details:

Opened Construction Kit
Deleted so named "quests" under "wilderness encounters" name. (There are no quests, there are scripted events).
Saved the file.

The complete list with what events is deleted is listed at http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:World_Interactions#Random_Events
